SEARCH
Package fr.cs.group12.myFoodora.userInterface

Class MyFoodoraCLUI

java.lang.Object
fr.cs.group12.myFoodora.userInterface.MyFoodoraCLUI
public class MyFoodoraCLUI extends Object
This class represents a command-line user interface (CLUI) for the MyFoodora system. It allows users to interact with the system by entering commands.

  • Constructor Details

    • MyFoodoraCLUI

      public MyFoodoraCLUI()

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup(String initpath)
      Sets up the system by reading configuration from the provided file path and creating instances of restaurants, customers, and couriers based on the configuration.
      Parameters:
      initpath - the file path to the initialization configuration file
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - if a number format is invalid in the configuration file

    • setup

      public void setup(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Sets up the CLUI by creating a specified number of restaurants, customers, and couriers.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the number of restaurants, customers, and couriers (3 tokens expected).

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the CLUI and allows the user to interact with the system.

    • executeCommand

      public void executeCommand(String input)
      Executes a command input by the user.
      Parameters:
      input - The command input by the user.

    • login

      public void login(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Logs a user into the system.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the username and password (2 tokens expected).

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs the current user out of the system.

    • giveConsensusNotification

      public void giveConsensusNotification()
      Gives consensus for special offer notifications if the current user is a customer.

    • removeConsensusNotification

      public void removeConsensusNotification()
      Removes consensus for special offer notifications if the current user is a customer.

    • showNotification

      public void showNotification()
      Shows the notifications for the current user if they are a customer.

    • showHistory

      public void showHistory()
      Shows the order history for the current user.

    • registerRestaurant

      public void registerRestaurant(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Registers a new restaurant in the system. Only a manager can register a restaurant.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the restaurant details (4 tokens expected).

    • registerCustomer

      public void registerCustomer(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Registers a new customer in the system. Only a manager can register a customer.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the customer details (5 tokens expected).

    • registerCourier

      public void registerCourier(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Registers a new courier in the system. Only a manager can register a courier.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the courier details (5 tokens expected).

    • addDishRestaurantMenu

      public void addDishRestaurantMenu(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Adds a dish to the restaurant's menu.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the command arguments: name type price [isVegetarian isGlutenFree]. The name, type, and price are required, while the isVegetarian and isGlutenFree flags are optional.

    • createMeal

      public void createMeal(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Creates a meal consisting of multiple items.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the command arguments: name mealType item1 item2 [item3]. The name, meal type, and at least two items are required.

    • showMeals

      public void showMeals()
      Displays all meals offered by the restaurant.

    • showMeal

      public void showMeal(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Displays details of a specific meal.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the command argument: mealName. The name of the meal to show.

    • setSpecialOffer

      public void setSpecialOffer(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Sets a special offer (meal of the week) for the restaurant.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the command argument: name. The name of the meal to set as the special offer.

    • removeSpecialOffer

      public void removeSpecialOffer()
      Removes the special offer (meal of the week) for the restaurant.

    • showPoints

      public void showPoints()
      Displays the points on the customer's fidelity card.

    • createOrder

      public void createOrder(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Creates an order for the customer.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the command arguments: restaurantName orderName. The name of the restaurant and the name of the order.

    • addItem2Order

      public void addItem2Order(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Adds an item to an existing order.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the command arguments: orderName itemName. The name of the order and the name of the item to add.

    • endOrder

      public void endOrder(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Finalizes and pays for an order by the current customer.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the order name, day, month, and year. Usage: endOrder orderName day month year

    • onDuty

      public void onDuty()
      Sets the current courier on duty. Only a courier can set themselves on duty.

    • offDuty

      public void offDuty()
      Sets the current courier off duty. Only a courier can set themselves off duty.

    • findDeliverer

      public void findDeliverer(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Allocates a courier to deliver an order for the current restaurant.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the order name. Usage: findDeliverer orderName

    • changeLocation

      public void changeLocation(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Changes the location of the current courier.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the latitude and longitude. Usage: changeLocation latitude,longitude

    • setDeliveryPolicy

      public void setDeliveryPolicy(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Sets the delivery policy of the system.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the policy name. Usage: setDeliveryPolicy policyName

    • setProfitPolicy

      public void setProfitPolicy(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Sets the profit policy of the system.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the policy name. Usage: setProfitPolicy policyName

    • applyProfitPolicy

      public void applyProfitPolicy(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Applies the profit policy with the specified target profit.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the target profit. Usage: applyProfitPolicy targetProfit

    • associateCard

      public void associateCard(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Associates a fidelity card with a customer.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the username and card type. Usage: associateCard username cardType

    • showCourierDeliveries

      public void showCourierDeliveries()
      Shows the number of deliveries completed by each courier. Only a manager can show courier deliveries.

    • showRestaurantTop

      public void showRestaurantTop()
      Shows the top restaurants based on the number of delivered orders. Only a manager can show restaurant statistics.

    • showCustomers

      public void showCustomers()
      Displays a list of all registered customers.

    • showMenuItem

      public void showMenuItem(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Displays the menu items of a specified restaurant.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the restaurant name. Usage: showMenuItem restaurantName

    • showTotalProfit

      public void showTotalProfit()
      Shows the total profit of the system. Only a manager can show the total profit.

    • showTotalProfitPeriod

      public void showTotalProfitPeriod(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Shows the total profit of the system for a specified period.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the start and end dates. Usage: showTotalProfitPeriod startDay startMonth startYear endDay endMonth endYear

    • showAverageIncomePerCustomer

      public void showAverageIncomePerCustomer()
      Shows the average income per customer. Only a manager can show the average income per customer.

    • showAverageIncomePerCustomerPeriod

      public void showAverageIncomePerCustomerPeriod(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Shows the average income per customer for a specified period.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the start and end dates. Usage: showAverageIncomePerCustomerPeriod startDay startMonth startYear endDay endMonth endYear

    • runTest

      public void runTest(StringTokenizer tokenizer)
      Runs a test script from a specified file.
      Parameters:
      tokenizer - A StringTokenizer containing the file path. Usage: runTest filepath

    • help

      public void help()
      Displays the list of available commands.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method to start the MyFoodora command-line user interface (CLUI). This method initializes an instance of MyFoodoraCLUI and starts it.
      Parameters:
      args - command-line arguments (not used in this method)
